name: whereby.com Minimal Dark Theme
additional_info:
ver 1.0 - Nov. 19th 2018 - Initial release.
ver 1.1 - March 12th, 2019 - Removed sticker support and additional bug fixes.
ver 1.2 - August 14th 2019 - Included support for new domain and themed additional parts of the site.
ver 2.0 - December 14th, 2019 - Completely rewritten to support the new site design. Legacy code is commented out but still works for old layout as well.
ver 2.1 - December 19th, 2019 - Small bug fixes and improvements.
ver 2.2 - January 11th, 2020 - Custom scroll bar and fixed chat border when chat is full.
ver 2.3 - January 14th, 2020 - Fixed background.
ver 2.4 - January 21st, 2020 - Fixed bugs caused by update and minor improvements to various things.
ver 2.5 - February 12th, 2020 - Minor bug fixes.
ver 2.6 - April 20th, 2020 - Minor updates and bug fixes.
ver 3.0 b1 - September 19th, 2020 - Entire theme rewrite due to new changes breaking everything. Only basic support for now.
